text: Apostolidi () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Takhtamukayskoye Rural Settlement of Takhtamukaysky District, the Republic of Adygea, Russia. The population was 93 as of 2018. There are 3 streets. == Geography == The khutor is located 3 km south-west of Takhtamukay. == Ethnicity == The khutor is inhabited by Russians and Ukrainians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Takhtamukaysky District
title: Apostolidi
